original_text: But Saul and the army spared Agag and the best of the sheep and cattle, the fat calves and lambs—everything that was good. These they were unwilling to destroy completely, but everything that was despised and weak they totally destroyed.
korean_text: 사울과 백성이 아각과 그의 양과 소의 가장 좋은 것 또는 기름진 것과 어린 양과 모든 좋은 것을 남기고 진멸하기를 즐겨 아니하고 가치 없고 하찮은 것은 진멸하니라

sentences.original_text: But Saul and the army spared Agag
and the best of the sheep and cattle
sentences.korean_translation: 양과 소 중 가장 좋은 것들도 살려두었으며

sentences.original_text: These they were unwilling to destroy completely
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들을 그들은 완전히 파괴하기를 원하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but everything that was despised and weak
